intro: PicWe is the world’s first decentralized infrastructure

section2.title: Awakening the Map of Worlds
intro: Isolated chains are like uncharted islands, disconnected and waiting tobe explored.
Here, you are the trailblazer awakening a new era.
Every interaction is a voyage; every puzzle piece reshapes the world.
When the routes finally connect, a boundless, decentralized on-chain world will emerge.
section2.intro2: Set sail, explorer—you are the creator of this on-chain map.

section3.intro1: Omnichain Infrastructure. Real-World Finance. One Seamless Future.
section3.title: $PIC for the Community
section3.subtitle: A total of 300 million $PIC tokens will be released to the community as we navigate five essential milestones. Each milestone marks significant progress on our voyage toward realizing seamless omni-chain liquidity connecting every isolated chain into one cohesive ecosystem.

section4.title: Seamless Liquidity
section4.intro: One-stop suite for border-free DeFi on EVM and beyond.

item3.title: IRO Asset Launchpad
item3.intro:
A Standardized Model for Tokenizing
RWAs —Unified Platform for Issuance,Distribution,and Trading.

item4.title: RWA DEX
item4.intro: Rediscover Finance —Capital Providers Share in Long Term Profits Through RWAs.

item5.title: Omnichain Swap
item5.intro: Seamless Cross-Chain Asset Trading with CATM Model.

item1.title: Decentralized & Bridgeless
item1.intro: No bridges required —funds remain in users’wallets, minimizingcross-chain attack vectors.

item2.title: Multi-Chain Ready
item2.intro: Supports Movement and EVM chains, with Solana integration coming soon.

item3.title: Transparent & Open
item3.intro: 100% on-chain execution with open source APIs and contracts. All transactions are fully verifiable.

item4.title: Community-Driven
item4.intro: $PIC holders govern protocol decisions,roadmap, and revenue distribution — empowering the community.

item5.title: Built for DApps
item5.intro: Plug-and-play liquidity APIs and a WEUSD settlement layer enable rapid deployment of cross chain dApps.

footer.title: Be Part of Us

footer.intro: Built by buliders, for community — PicWe connects DeFi with real-world finance.
